DLL_API FIBITMAP *DLL_CALLCONV FreeImageAlgorithms_Convolve (FIABITMAP src, int kernel_x_radius, int kernel_y_radius, double *kernel, double divider)
 Convolve and image with a kernel.

Detailed Description

Provides a convolution function.

Function Documentation

int  kernel_x_radius,
int  kernel_y_radius,
double *  kernel,

)

Convolve and image with a kernel.

Parameters:
src FIBITMAP bitmap to perform the convolution on.
kernel_x_radius for a kernel of width 3 the x radius would be 1.
kernel_y_radius for a kernel of height 3 the y radius would be 1.
kernel array representing the values of the kernel.
divider The divider of the kernel);
Returns:
FIBITMAP on success or NULL on error.
